sen.j: 駅舎は3階建てで、2階・3階部分が日本初の女性専用ホテル「嵐山レディースホテル」となっていたが、2002年に営業を終了し、土産物屋、漬物屋、飲食店などが入った商業施設「嵐山駅はんなり・ほっこりスクエア」に改装され、2007年10月には全面改装された。
sen.e: The station building is 3 storied and Arashiyama Ladies Hotel, which was then Japan's first hotel exclusive for female, had occupied 2nd and 3rd floor but it ceased business and was converted into commercial facilities "Arashiyama Station Hannari-Hokkori Square", which accommodates souvenir shops, Japanese pickle shops and restaurants, in 2002 and in 2007, it was refurbished thoroughly.

The station building has three stories, and the Arashiyama Ladies Hotel, which was then Japan's first hotel exclusively for women, had occupied the second and third floors but in 2002 it ceased business and was converted into the commercial facilities "Arashiyama Station Hannari-Hokkori Square," which houses souvenir shops, Japanese pickle shops and restaurants; in 2007, it was fully refurbished.
